name: 2022 4th International Symposium on Signal Processing Systems
content: Publication: All submissions will be thoroughly peer-reviewed by experts based on originality, significance and clarity. All accepted and presented papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9610-3), which will be archived at Online digital library, and will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
